How wide the buttons will be scaled with the game

How wide the button images are

BLUE_PROJECTILE - Static variable in class utils.LoadSave
the file containing all of the blue projectile sprites/animations
borderBottom - Variable in class states.Playing
50% of the screen is hidden, used as the bottom border for screen rendering.
borderLeft - Variable in class states.Playing
50% of the screen is rendered, used as the left border for screen rendering.
borderRight - Variable in class states.Playing
50% of the screen is hidden, used as the right border for screen rendering.
borderTop - Variable in class states.Playing
50% of the screen is rendered, used as the top border for screen rendering.
bounds - Variable in class ui.MenuButton
The bounds that determine where the user can click on a button

This is the boundary of the button: where the mouse can click on it
bounds - Variable in class ui.PauseButton
the area where the mouse can hover/click on the button

Button state - Confirm sound effect
BTN_HOVER - Static variable in class gameaudio.AudioPlayer
Button state - Hover sound effect
btnLocations - Variable in class states.Overworld
The array of button locations that will be displayed on screen, it is the same array as the Constants.OverworldButtonConstants.BUTTON_POINT_ARRAY.
BUTTON_POINT_ARRAY - Static variable in class utils.Constants.OverworldButtonConstants
This is a final array of all 5 Levels, so that it can be easily access by the Overworld GameState
BUTTON_SIZE - Static variable in class utils.Constants.OverworldButtonConstants
This is the size of 1 side of the square Overworld Buttons
buttonArr - Variable in class states.Overworld
The array of OverworldButtons that will be displayed on screen that match to the locations array

The different images for the end button (default/hover/click images)
buttons - Variable in class states.Menu
All of the buttons that will displayed on screen
